catalystcore.ponder.torch_flower_essence: Extracting the Torch Flower Essence with a Phial
First, we'll need to grow a Torchflower to extract it's essence

Next, we're going to need some Shears and a Reinforced Phial
 The Phial goes on the Left Hand
 And the Shears on the Right Hand
The plant will lose its properties and decay in the process...
So, a method to duplicate these flowers is suggested.
catalystcore.ponder.sculk_biomass.header: Extracting the Biomass from the Sculk
catalystcore.ponder.sculk_biomass.text_1: To extract this biomass you will need to venture into the Deep Dark.
catalystcore.ponder.sculk_biomass.text_2:
Hold a Golden Shovel on you Right Hand and a Reinforced Phial on your Left Hand.

Golden Equipment has some unique traits to manipulate sculk with ease.
catalystcore.ponder.sculk_biomass.text_3: We can extract the Biomass from any Sculk block, except for the veins as they're extremely delicate.
catalystcore.ponder.sculk_biomass.text_4: But be careful to not attract unwanted attention from Shriekers.
catalystcore.ponder.sculk_biomass.text_5: And after all this, we now have a Reinforced Phial filled with Sculk Biomass.
catalystcore.ponder.tag.phials.descripti: Reinforced Phials capable of extracting and storing arcane or biological essence
catalystcore.ponder.tag.slates.descripti: Runic slates used for rituals or crafting
